metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0477 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The parse function in Email::Address module before 1.905 for Perl uses an inefficient regular expression, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via an empty quoted string in an RFC 2822 address.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fixes in both 1.904 and 1.905 (and maybe before?)

criterions.comment: libemail-address-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
